ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mhm0.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` S ) |
| 2 |  | mhm0.y | |- Y = ( 0g ` T ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` T ) = ( Base ` T ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` S ) = ( +g ` S ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` T ) = ( +g ` T ) |
| 7 | 3, 4, 5, 6, 1, 2 | #P_ismhm | |- ( F e. ( S MndHom T ) <-> ( ( S e. Mnd /\ T e. Mnd ) /\ ( F : ( Base ` S ) --> ( Base ` T ) /\ A. x e. ( Base ` S ) A. y e. ( Base ` S ) ( F ` ( x ( +g ` S ) y ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) ( +g ` T ) ( F ` y ) ) /\ ( F ` .0. ) = Y ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_simprbi | |- ( F e. ( S MndHom T ) -> ( F : ( Base ` S ) --> ( Base ` T ) /\ A. x e. ( Base ` S ) A. y e. ( Base ` S ) ( F ` ( x ( +g ` S ) y ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) ( +g ` T ) ( F ` y ) ) /\ ( F ` .0. ) = Y ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_simp3d | |- ( F e. ( S MndHom T ) -> ( F ` .0. ) = Y ) |
